fr.liglab.adele.icasa.listener
Interface IcasaListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
DeviceListener<T>, DeviceTypeListener, FilteredDeviceListener<T>, LocatedDeviceListener, MultiEventListener, ZoneListener, ZonePropListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
EmptyDeviceListener, EmptyLocatedDeviceListener, EmptyZoneListener
public interface IcasaListener

Every listener in iCasa Platform has to implement this interface.

Author:
Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira
